replies.body: The nerfs are gonna be soooooooo nice ;)

When people think she's nerfed, if you have seen boxboxs new video to him its a buff not a nerf ahahaha but hay people think the new oce skin is sht so whatever riot releases everyone complains about it OCE FOR YOU...
No no no, I have a simple solution. It involves riot deleting ALL her game files.

Shes getting reworked/"nerfed" because she has too many unhealthy mechanics and not enough outplay potential, thats why she's seen as such a toxic champ. Along with Annie and Warwick, these champs are long overdue reworks.

Im right with you here! i think edge is stupid, give her mana!!!
